title: CHAOSTOO
author: CHAOSTOO
content: I need artists or just crypto-enthusiasts for my project in Metaverse. If you are a responsible and creative person, I will be waiting for you in my team.From you will be required, not much information about yourself.Projects (if any).Payment will be negotiated during the interview.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: I suggest you move this thread to the service board here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=52.0 maybe you can see the service you need there

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: This thread supposed to be on service board just as Dr.Bitcoin_Strange said.If you do not know how to move topic, is is simple. Just scroll down, at the left side lower part of this thread, you will see move topic and lock topic beside it. Click on move topic to find service board and move it there.
